title: A Distorted Love For The Pathetic Omega
alternative_title: Aware na Omega ni Yuganda Ai wo ; 憐れなΩに歪んだ愛を
status: Aware na Omega ni Yuganda Ai wo ; 憐れなΩに歪んだ愛を
description:
Description :
        "You have the face of an omega who yearns for an alpha..." Kuraki is an elite, beautiful alpha who is the student council president of an all-alpha school. Tashiro, a member of the student council, respects the ambitious and strict attitude he has towards everyone and himself, but also disagrees with his ways. But one day, omega pheromones start seeping out of Kuraki for some reason...! "I feel strange when you're around...!" Kuraki's behind is drenched with liquid and smoothly lets Tashiro in...
